definition: arc length (the length of a curve segment)
parametrization by arc length (of a space curve)

sentences.english: Post buckling analysis was traditionally conducted by arc length method.
sentences.chinese: 結構後屈曲分析傳統上都是採用弧長控制法來處理。

sentences.english: A new algorithm was presented herein to solve the highlight line, which was based on the arc-length parameterization.
sentences.chinese: 給出了一種基於高光線弧長參數的求解高光線新算法。

sentences.english: So, the usual notation that we will have is  for arc length.
sentences.chinese: 通常我們用符號s來表示弧長。

sentences.english: Well, so in particular,how do you relate arc length and time?
sentences.chinese: 尤其是你怎麼把弧長和時間聯繫起來？
